title: SE Stainless Steel Mini Pliers Set (5 PC.) - 7042MP
description: The SE Stainless Steel Mini Pliers Set (5 PC.) is especially handy for bead stringers on the go! They are cute to look at and extremely functional. The working head is constructed from the same sized blanks as larger pliers. This handy "Go Anywhere" set includes a chain, flat, round, side cutter, and split ring. This is great for opening split rings, cutting and bending wire, beading, wire wrapping, and jewelry repair. They feature PVC grips and a single leaf spring for comfort and ease of use. They are 3" long and come in a PVC pouch. The jaws have a smooth construction. SE is committed to providing the customer with the best source for value possible on the market. You will enjoy the quality, function and usefulness of our SE Stainless Steel Mini Pliers Set (5 PC.). IPR Rights Notice: Important: Avoid getting counterfeit items. Genuine SE products come with the SE logo on the packaging. SE is a registered trademark protected by US Trademark Law.
